overview: Sheng follows his master Yuan Gong in his training, but he never forgets his beloved fox demon Meier. At the same time, the strange scenes in his dream make him even more uneasy and many doubts are solved one by one along with his journey to find the "dream". The fox demon Meier represents the group that Sheng is fighting against, and the love relationship makes Sheng even more in a dilemma.
title: Sky Book Romance
